description: Auto Dev hooks for tmux and session management

hooks.name: session-start
hooks.description: Initialize session directory structure when /ad:run creates a new session

hooks.name: tmux-retile
hooks.description: Auto-retile panes when new pane is created in tmux

hooks.name: tmux-retile-on-close
hooks.description: Auto-retile panes when a pane is closed

hooks.name: pane-logging
hooks.description: Enable logging for new agent panes
hooks.notes: Implemented in spinup.sh via tmux pipe-pane

hooks.name: session-cleanup-reminder
hooks.description: Remind about cleanup for completed sessions older than 3 days
hooks.notes: CEO should notify God about completed sessions

tmux_hooks.description: These hooks are set up by dashboard.sh when initializing the tmux session

notes: Most hooks are implemented directly in scripts rather than as Claude Code hooks
tmux hooks are set via: tmux set-hook -t SESSION_NAME HOOK_NAME 'COMMAND'
Agent logging is set up via: tmux pipe-pane -t PANE -o 'cat >> LOG_PATH'
This file serves as documentation for the hook system
